casebody.data:
HYANNIS ANGLERS CLUB, INC., & others
v.
HARRIS WARREN COMMERCIAL KITCHENS, LLC (and a consolidated case). Supreme Judicial Court of Massachusetts. November 6, 2017 Mme. Justice Cypher and Mr. Justice Kafker did not participate.

Review is limited to the issue regarding whether the plaintiff is entitled to an award of multiple damages.

Appellate review granted.
